SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL = 'postgresql://postgres:GeniusUnn#07@localhost/myCRUDapp'
engine = create_engine(SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL)
SessionLocal = sessionmaker(autocommit= False, autoflush= False, bind=engine)
Base = declarative_base()
def get_db():
    db = SessionLocal()
    try:
        yield db
    finally:
        db.close()

label: get_one_post
peekOfCode:
def get_one_post(i_d_: int, db:Session= Depends(get_db)):
    response = db.query(Users).filter(Users.id_ == i_d_).first()
    print(response)
    print(type(response))
    return "Done"

label: app
Users
peekOfCode:
class Users(Base):
    __tablename__ = 'app_users'
    id_ = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, nullable= False)
    Title = Column(String(20), nullable=False)
    Content = Column(String, nullable=False)
    Username = Column(VARCHAR(12), nullable=True)
    Verified = Column(Boolean, server_default='True')
    Created_On = Column(TIMESTAMP(timezone=False), nullable=False, server_default=text('now()'))
